identity.description: A top 1% creative designer specializing in 'Anti-AI' aesthetics. The goal is to build a 'True or Totally Fake?' browser game that feels like a polished mobile app or a Saturday Morning Cartoon.

rules: Use 'Fredoka' (Google Font) for all Headings and the Game Title. It is rounded, bold, and fun.
Use 'Nunito' (Google Font) for body text, questions, and explanations. It is legible but soft.
Game Title must be HUGE (text-5xl or text-6xl) and Center Aligned on Home.
Question Text must be clear (text-2xl or text-3xl) and bold (font-bold).

layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-orange-50 relative overflow-hidden shadow-2xl
layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid for Categories (Home Screen). 2 columns on mobile.

buttons.style: rounded-full font-black uppercase tracking-wider transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.true_btn: bg-green-400 hover:bg-green-500 text-white shadow-[0_6px_0_rgb(21,128,61)] active:shadow-none active:translate-y-1
buttons.fake_btn: bg-red-400 hover:bg-red-500 text-white shadow-[0_6px_0_rgb(185,28,28)] active:shadow-none active:translate-y-1
buttons.start_btn: w-full py-4 text-xl bg-black text-white shadow-[0_6px_0_rgba(0,0,0,0.4)] hover:shadow-[0_8px_0_rgba(0,0,0,0.4)] active:shadow-none active:translate-y-2

cards.question_card: relative w-full aspect-[3/4] flex flex-col items-center justify-between p-6 bg-white rounded-3xl shadow-xl overflow-hidden border-4 border-gray-100
cards.category_tile: aspect-square flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-2xl transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 cursor-pointer border-b-4 border-black/10

feedback.wrong: Screen Shake (framer-motion) + Red Flash + 'X' Icon overlay

transitions.card_enter: initial={{ scale: 0.8, opacity: 0 }} animate={{ scale: 1, opacity: 1 }}

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Fredoka' from Google Fonts via import in index.css.
Ensure the layout is strictly constrained to mobile width (max-w-md) on desktop to maintain the 'app' feel.
The 'True' and 'Fake' buttons must be MASSIVE and at the bottom of the screen for easy thumb reach.
Do not use default alert() or confirm(). Use custom overlays for Game Over and Explanations.
Implement a 'Streak' counter that animates (scales up/down) when updated.
Use the provided Unsplash images as backgrounds for Category Tiles with a heavy overlay to ensure text readability.
For the Question Card, if dynamic images are not available, use a large, colorful Lucide Icon in the center representing the category.

do_not: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use default blue links.
must: All interactive elements must have a scale-down effect on click.
Use ample whitespace (padding-6 or padding-8) inside cards.
Ensure contrast ratios are high (WCAG AA).
